title: Pairwise Comparison Questionnaire for Geomagnetic Observatory Site Selection
subtitle: Based on Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP)
institution: Institute of Geophysics, University of Tehran
description: This questionnaire aims to determine the importance and priority of technical and environmental standards in the process of geomagnetic observatory site selection in Tehran Province. Please evaluate the criteria using pairwise comparisons with the Saaty 1-9 scale.
instructions: For each pair of criteria, please answer this key question: To what extent is the evaluated criterion superior or inferior compared to the reference criterion? If the evaluated criterion is less important than the reference, use the reciprocal of the number.

step1.title: Main Criteria Comparison
step1.description: Please compare the relative importance of the three main criteria:

results.title: Final Results
results.thanks: Thank you for participating in this research
